cs.man.ac.uk.common

Class Common

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.man.ac.uk.common.Common

  • public class Common
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a number of utility methods for the application.

    1.0, 05/01/13
    Author:
    Rob Lyon
